DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of LATISSE® (bimatoprost 0.03%) in the augmentation of eyelashes in Korean women.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of LATISSE® in the Augmentation of Eyelashes of Korean Subjects
DOC.criteria: Eyelash prominence assessment of minimal or moderate Of Korean ethnicity Any eye disease or abnormality Any ocular surgery or use of any eyelash extension or eyelash growth products within 3 months Any permanent eyeliner within 5 years Eyelash implants of any kind Eyelash tint or dye application within 2 months Use of any treatment that may affect hair growth within 6 months
